attributes.action: Take action against Raheem Sterling’s disgusting treatment in the media.
attributes.background: Raheem Sterling has become the victim of unfair treatment from the media, he is slagged off for driving dirty cars, going to Greggs, shopping at Poundland and more - It is time something is done to PROTECT young english talent against these terrible media outlets.

rejection.details:
Complaints about the press are the responsibility of the Independent Press Standards Organisation (IPSO), not  the Government or Parliament. 

You can find out how to make a complaint to IPSO here:

https://www.ipso.co.uk/IPSO/makeacomplaint.html
